entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
